Canada's Deadly Secret: Saskatchewan Uranium and the Global Nuclear System bụ akwụkwọ afọ 2007 nke Jim Harding, ma gosipụta mmetụta ọjọọ na ikike ndị Aboriginal na ahụike gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi, na mmetụta nke azụmahịa n'efu
Harding na-ekwu na ike nuklia enweghị ike ibelata okpomọkụ ụwa nakwa na "Atom Udo" adịghị adị
Helen Caldicott dere okwu mmalite akwụkwọ ahụ.
Jim Harding bụ prọfesọ emeritus nke ọmụmụ gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi / ikpe ziri ezi ma bụrụ onye nduzi nyocha màkà Prairie Justice Research na Mahadum Regina
Ọ bụ ónyé guzobere Regina Group màkà Non-Nuclear Society na International Uranium Congress
Harding rụkwara ọrụ dị ka Prairie Correspondent maka Nuclear Free Press na ónyé ndụmọdụ màkà ihe nkiri Uranium.
